H0.text: English economist and physician Nicholas Barbon helped to pioneer which type of insurance in 1666. Life Insurance

H1.text: English economist and physician Nicholas Barbon helped to pioneer which type of insurance in 1666. Flood Insurance

H2.text: English economist and physician Nicholas Barbon helped to pioneer which type of insurance in 1666. Health Insurance

H3.text: English economist and physician Nicholas Barbon helped to pioneer which type of insurance in 1666. Fire Insurance

A4.text: In 1680â€“81, with 11 associates, he founded an 'Insurance Office for Houses' which offered fire insurance for up to 5,000 households in London.

A5.text: Fires were a major danger in London at the time: the Great Fire destroyed more than 13,000 houses and displaced about 100,000 people, and another conflagration in 1678 damaged the Middle Temple, one of the Inns of Court.

A6.text: In 1681, economist Nicholas Barbon and eleven associates established the first fire insurance company, the 'Insurance Office for Houses', at the back of the Royal Exchange to insure brick and frame homes.
